recipesJson.name: Simple Strawberry Cream
recipesJson.author: RUG_ly
recipesJson.description: The mix is what it is. Nothing fancy and no fuss. Best to let it sit over night before vaping.

reviews.text: I mixed this with VT Sweet Strawberry instead of CAP(off notes for me) and LB Vanilla Ice Cream instead of TPA and this is a good mix that's pretty balanced.
